content.rendered:
Our hearts go out to all who have been affected by Hurricane Harvey. The safety and well-being of our community is our utmost concern and we are prepared to assist, in any way we can.

We have identified all accounts in the impacted areas and are reaching out to customers individually to make sure they and their families are safe and aid however possible. Market Leader is working tirelessly to assist each customer based on their specific needs and we encourage anyone else who can do the same.

We are also partnering with organizations on the ground in Texas and will be sending volunteers to aid in disaster relief over the coming weeks.

Recovering from Harvey is going to be a long-term process and the need for assistance will be ongoing. We have been exploring the most productive way to help and, at this point, financial relief and monetary donations are the most effective way to give to those affected, as needs are continuously shifting and the ability to store and distribute products is limited.

The following organizations are accepting donations that benefit the real estate community:

  • KW Cares Red Relief for Hurricane Harvey
  • Realogy Charitable Foundation for the Red Cross
  • NAR REALTORS® Relief Foundation

If you, your community, or business have been affected by Hurricane Harvey, you have resources.

Inman has published a comprehensive disaster guide for real estate professionals who have been affected by Hurricane Harvey. The Red Cross also offers guides on disaster relief and recovery services.

Now, more than ever, it is important to be a resource for your community and clients. Assist, guide, and protect each other.

We will see you soon, Texas.

-The Market Leader Team
